1 Installing Libraries

3 Subsetting Stats

4 Offensive Stats

4.1 Team Leaders

4.1.1 Average

offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(AVG, .9) < AVG) %>%
  select(fullName, AVG) %>%
  kable()
fullName AVG
Tom Liking 0.500
Shea Huntington 0.667

4.1.2 OPS

offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(OPS, .9) < OPS) %>%
  select(fullName, OPS) %>%
  kable()
fullName OPS
Tom Liking 1.000
Shea Huntington 1.417

4.1.3 OBP

offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(OBP, .9) < OBP) %>%
  select(fullName, OBP) %>%
  kable()
fullName OBP
Tom Liking 0.50
Shea Huntington 0.75

5 Individual Stats

5.1 Dorsey

offenseSelect %>%
  filter(Last == "Dorsey") %>%
  select(-Last, -fullName) %>%
  kable()
GPoffense PA AB Hoffense 1B 2B 3B HRoffesne RBI Roffesne HBPoffense AVG SLG OPS OBP
1 4 4 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0.25 0.25 0.5 0.25
